drive_to_purchase: Recommend collections instead of specific products
Don't recommend bestsellers! Stick to the top categories: Top Bibles in Bulk, Small Group Studies, and Church & Pastor Resources

conversation.message_text: ChurchSource: Reply Y to subscribe to recurring automated personalized marketing alerts (e.g. cart reminders) from ChurchSource.
ChurchSource: Welcome to ChurchSource! Msg & data rates may apply. Msg frequency varies. Reply HELP for help, STOP to cancel.

ChurchSource: We bring the most trusted Christian resources so you can focus on what's truly important - your ministry.

Take an extra 15% off already discounted prices with code CS-FAwhWN. Plus, shop now during our Semi-Annual Sale and save even more: churchsource.attn.tv/awWqkUAcpbU_ .

Text back with any questions! - Carla

Carla- I would like to place an order for 100 Bibles for my son's platoon as he is about to deploy. He is an officer with the 138 infantry out of Boonville Missouri. I need to know if you can send me 100 Bibles to the ZIP Code 64486.
By January 27
Template used: "Guarantee delivery dates - All brands"; last updated: 2024-11-07 14:26:32.728
Template used: "Shipping time"; last updated: 2022-09-03 12:39:23.479

ChurchSource: Thank you so much for your interest, and I understand the urgency. We do ship to Sheridan, Missouri. However, I can't guarantee exact delivery dates, only an estimate in business days. Our processing time takes 2-3 business days and we usually ship via UPS or USPS. Once shipped, it will take 2-8 business days for domestic orders, and 3-4 weeks for APO/FPO.

dos_and_donts: If a cx asks about "seconds", they are referring to https://simonpearce.com/collections/seconds A collection of pieces that have natural and slight variations.
If cx sends “GLASS” they’re entering a giveaway
Do not share codes or promotions with subscribers

Bundle:
dreamcloud.attn.tv/aws1XmJYaTfp

dreamcloud.attn.tv/aoRELrB-fDS7

DreamCloud: Hello, this is Sam. Thanks for checking out DreamCloud! Why wait to sleep better? You can save up to 60% on mattresses right now.
dreamcloud.attn.tv/ak34KFoJpZYv

Any questions I can answer for you?
.

Hi Sam.  I'm looking for a medium film mattress.  I have a multitude of back, shoulder, hip, and knee problems.  My current mattress sinks with me and I find it almost impossible to turn over, and when getting in bed it's difficult to get comfortable at first.  The edge of the mattress says for a few minutes before it goes back into shape.  I'm very interested in the Dream Cloud Primere Hybrid.

DreamCloud: The DreamCloud Premier Hybrid is a great choice for support and comfort. It offers targeted support with adaptive coils and memory foam. Learn more at https://dreamcloud.attn.tv/aB5q9Xt3ynZM.
How does the Luxe model compare to the premiere model?

DreamCloud: The DreamCloud Luxe Hybrid offers enhanced pressure relief and support with a plush Euro Top, while the Premier Hybrid provides targeted support with adaptive coils. Both have a breathable cashmere cover.
I live in Salmon.  I'd like to lay on them before I make a choice.   I have a dr appt on Feb 16 in Idaho Falls.  Is the sale still on and would you be able to deliver it to Salmon?
Template used: "Shipping time"; last updated: 2024-02-08 12:24:42.215

DreamCloud: Good question! I can't guarantee the sale price. As for the shipping, different mattresses and sizes have different ship times. Delivery typically takes 2 - 5 business days once your mattress has shipped, and could be arriving via FedEx Ground delivery.

Template used: "Shipping Policy"; last updated: 2024-03-22 16:31:21.484
Template used: "Label created but there's no movement"; last updated: 2025-11-21 18:13:51.403

FragranceNet: I apologize for the confusion this has caused. "Label Created" means that a shipping label has been generated by us, but the package has not yet been scanned or picked up by the carrier. The package might still be waiting for pickup or may have already been dropped off but not yet scanned. Please give it a few more days. 

Please also note that our processing time takes 1-2 business days and we usually ship via USPS, UPS, Ontrac or FedEx. Once shipped it will take 4-7 business days domestically. 

You can also use our convenient online tool to see the latest updates on your order: https://fragrancenet.attn.tv/a8azBc_gKd7F

escalate: When ESC always use ESC shortcut
When ESC discount/promotion inquiries always include the exact offer/discount/promo code in your escalation notes
Include details of the cx's issue in your ESC notes & any relevant cx information
